titles.title: For the relief of Margarito Domantay.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 105-523.

calendar.text: Placed on the Private Calendar, Calendar No. 10.

action.text: Called up from the Private Calendar for consideration.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Oversight and Courts.

bill.summary: 1/7/1997--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay to a named retired U.S. Navy petty officer the amount of retired pay that he would have received for a specified period had he been initially retired in the grade of E-5, second class, rather than the grade of E-4, third class, in which he was mistakenly retired due to administrative error.
